text: Podstrmec () is a dispersed settlement southwest of Velike Lašče in Slovenia. The entire Municipality of Velike Lašče is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Velike Lašče municipal site ==References== ==External links== * *Podstrmec on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Velike Lašče
title: Podstrmec
